SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.COMP_ID ,B.COMP_NM ,A.AREA ,A.VHC_NO ,A.CHAS_NO ,A.MAKER ,DATE_FORMAT(A.RELS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RELS_DT ,A.MODEL_NM ,A.VHC_KIND ,A.ROUT_TYPE ,A.VHC_TYPE ,A.VHC_FUEL ,A.VHC_STS ,A.PSG_CNT ,A.SPARE_YN ,A.SCRAP_YN ,A.APPL_ST_DT ,A.APPL_ED_DT ,A.USE_YN ,A.REMARK
FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID
VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT ORG_ID ,ORG_NM FROM BMS_ORG_MST WHERE ORG_DIV = 'OD008'

SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.DVC_ID ,A.ORG_ID ,A.DVC_KIND ,A.INST_LOC ,A.DVC_IP ,A.MNG_ID
,A.USE_YN ,A.REMARK ,B.ORG_NM
FROM BMS_DVC_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_ORG_MST B ON A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID
WHERE A.VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID}

SELECT DVC_ID ,SN ,DATE_FORMAT(APLY_DATE, '%Y%m%d') APLY_DATE ,WORK_TYPE ,WORK_AMT ,REMARK FROM BMS_DVC_HIS
WHERE DVC_ID = #{DVC_ID} ORDER BY SN

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SEND_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') SEND_DATE ,MNG_ID ,DVC_COND ,VER_INFO ,REMARK FROM BMS_DVC_COND_LOG
WHERE MNG_ID = #{MNG_ID} AND DVC_COND = 'DC021'
